item.title: Petuum Software Engineering Intern
item.description: At enterprise machine learning startup Petuum in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, USA. endpreamble Researched efficient distributed learning algorithms for neural networks and machine learning models.

item.title: syncflowy: a synergistic cross between Google Docs and Workflowy
item.description:
Dredged these two videos up from an old USB back when Macbooks still came with USB-A ports. I’m sad to say I don’t have any videos of the more interesting operations. The unit tests covered them, mind you!

endpreamble

Based on operational transform as described in the Jupiter collaborative system.
